name: Super Robot Steel Robbery Squad
description:
Reach transformation point with your warrior robbery squad and quickly transform yourself from X robot into an amazing robot steel car. Go on super speed robot car drive with your robbery squad to reach robbery spot quickly. Once you reach the bank start super warrior shooting with your advanced MP5, M4, sniper rifles, shot gun and throw ballistic grenade on the angry commando guards securing bank. Clear bank entrance along with your robot robbery squad with super amazing sniper shooting skills and then move inside bank for theft. Kill and shoot as angry furious steel X robot warrior to clear your way. Use all you super sniper shooting skills and help your master robbery squad in this furious battle. Be the dare devil robot master and enter into locker room to find gold and cash. Steal gold and cash and exit by transforming robot into steel car, escape bank after completing stealing mission and return to your robot home with fellow gangsters. Enjoy simulator plus action game shooting experience.

For creating chaos in the city let’s be ready for grand city super theft mission for that transform from futuristic robot into car first and then drive around mad city unless you reach big city mall with your super robbery grand squad. The mall is secured with trained commando guards standing high alert. It isn’t easy to rob city mall unless you utilize your warrior robot sniping and robot shooting skills with MP5, M4 and shotgun. As an experienced super robot shooter you are expected to kill all police commando guards on duty and secure place for your super robbery squad. Counter enemy attacks wisely and strike back hard to win this epic robbery battle in city mall. Let the bullets fly in intense sniping battle. Show no mercy to angry enemies in Super Robot Steel Robbery Squad. Be an evil sniper super X robot master and launch deadly attack on brutal police commando guards.

Steal all super cars from car showroom to make yourself the richest sniper robot master of big city. Rob complete show room filled with luxurious and expensive cars and complete robbery mission is to steal them with super trained squad while fighting with the angry rangers and guards on your way. Steal super cars and exit by transforming into steel car, escape this car showroom after completing robot robbery mission and return to your home with super gangster squad of 2017 as real X robot warrior.
